get.description: Returns runtime metadata for the latest build of a job.

post.description: Attach upstream remote + persist config (per workspace job).
Fetch upstream refs based on saved upstream.json.

get.description: Show ahead/behind vs upstream branch + file drift summary.

parameters.name: paths

schema.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include (e.g., app,ui,copilot_spec.yaml)
schema.title: Paths

parameters.description: Comma-separated path prefixes to include (e.g., app,ui,copilot_spec.yaml)

get.description:
direction:
  - upstream_to_workspace: git diff upstream_ref..HEAD
  - workspace_to_upstream: git diff HEAD..upstream_ref
paths:
  - comma-separated scope prefixes, e.g. jobs,dags,configs
  - .copilot is always excluded

post.description:
Upstream switching modes:
  - replace: update upstream remote/branch (baseline unchanged)
  - rebaseline: replace + set baseline to current HEAD
  - reset: replace + hard reset workspace to upstream ref + baseline = new HEAD (destructive)

parameters.name: force

schema.description: Only used for reset mode to allow dirty repos
schema.title: Force

parameters.description: Only used for reset mode to allow dirty repos

parameters.name: clean_untracked

schema.description: Only used for reset mode; runs git clean -fd after reset
schema.title: Clean Untracked

parameters.description: Only used for reset mode; runs git clean -fd after reset

schema.title: Response Sync Plan Sync Plan Post
Response Get Plan Sync Plan  Plan Id  Get
Response Sync Apply Sync Apply Post
Response Simulate Rebase Sync Rebase Simulate Post
Response Get Plans Build Plans Get
Response Get Plan Build Plan  Plan Id  Get
Response Get Events Build Events Get

parameters.name: includes

schema.description: Comma-separated include dirs relative to workspace job root
schema.title: Includes

parameters.description: Comma-separated include dirs relative to workspace job root

schema.title: Response Audit Architecture Audit Architecture Get

get.description:
Readiness should reflect ability to serve real traffic.
Keep checks fast + local (no slow downstream calls).

schema.title: Response Get Config Federation Config Get
Response Connect Repo Federation Connect Post
Response Sign Manifest Workspace Repro Sign Get
Response Verify Manifest Workspace Repro Verify Post
Response Apply Build Api V2 Build Apply Post
Response Run Build Api V2 Build Run Post
Response Cancel Build Api V2 Build Cancel Post
Response Status Api V2 Build Status  Job Name  Get
Response History Api V2 Build History  Job Name  Get

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Allowlist. If set, only these run.

BuildV2Request.title: BuildV2Request
BuildV2Request.description: Build V2: UI sends a full spec (no need for copilot_spec.yaml).

description.title: Description
description.default: Example Spark pipeline generated by Copilot

artifact_path.title: Artifact Path
artifact_path.description: Local filesystem path to release tar.gz

strict_no_extras.title: Strict No Extras
strict_no_extras.description: If true, fail when tar contains extra files not listed in manifest

require_packaging_manifest.title: Require Packaging Manifest
require_packaging_manifest.description: If false, only sha256 is verified (legacy)
